hakkimda_p1: Hello, My name is Metehan Çekici. I was born on July 1, 2000. I graduated from the Department of Computer Programming at Ankara Yıldırım Beyazıt University. Since 2020, I have been trying to add something new to myself in the web development industry.
hakkimda_p2: For 1-2 years, I tried to develop myself as a software developer in this sector by offering paid solutions to many people from the r10.net webmaster platform. During this process, I gained experience by working almost entirely in the Front-End field.
hakkimda_p3: I have a hardworking and responsible personality. I am a person who is very enthusiastic and has career goals in the field of web development. I have created a roadmap for myself as Full-Stack and I continue to improve myself day by day in this field.
hakkimda_p4: In line with the knowledge and experience I have gained so far, the technologies and programming languages I actively use are as follows: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, Node.js, PHP, MySQL
iletisim_aciklama: You can send me any message you want to leave on any topic below. I will get back to you as soon as possible!
